text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ne'mati Allohro ʙar xud ʙa jod ovared; on goh ki sipohijone [az qaʙoili araʙ] ʙa sujaton omadand. Pas, Mo tundʙode [saxt] va laskare [az faristagon] ki onhoro namedided, ʙar onon firistodem [va ʙa saxti sikastason dodem]; va hamvora Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekuned ʙinost
